Posts.Content: goodiedo wrote: This is her brother reporting that she has been banned from this website and unable to write any posts on any topic.  This is following supportive comments she made on Dr. Ruddy [I think - check spelling] on a Pink Virus.  She did not know what hit her since by the time she read the warnings from the moderators, she was taking off completely.  She is crying, upset since this is one of the few places that she felt that she can come and give or receive support on such a lifechanging illness.  My best to all of her supportive friends that she has grown to love over the last few months.  Me and my sisters will continue to support her physical and emotional needs. Log in to post a reply
